extendedInfo.description: Practice all 860 of the latest (2013) ADI Theory Test Revision Questions ADI Theory Test UK allows you to practice for your test whenever and wherever you like. All 860 of the latest official DSA revision questions covering all four bands of the test are included. This simple and intuitive app that allows you to answer questions at your leisure or under real test conditions, whilst advanced statistics enables you to keep track of your progress. ***Key features:Revise each of the four bands of the test separately or at the same timeQuestions are scored immediately and each question comes with full background informationNo annoying repetition - choose how many times you want to repeat questions previously answered correctlyMock test function uses the same scoring and time limit as the real testSimple and intuitive interface allows you to focus your efforts on revision]Advanced statistics all you to keep track of your progress overall and on different sections of the testAbsolutely NO ADVERTSHighway code includedRegularly updated - 2013 readyWorks offline - train whenever and wherever you wantCrown copyright material has been reproduced by permission of the Driving Standards Agency, which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: I prepared for my test with this app on my Nexus 7 and I passed straight first time. Q&A are almost exact to real test. The only reason I didn\'t give 5star it the UI, its a bit boring. Improve the UI and I will give you 5stars. Best ADI training app available here so far.
reviews.author: David Aikins-Bekoe

reviews.title: Great revision tool!
reviews.comment: Used this app in the run up to my adi theory test and what can I say!! Only got 3 questions wrong on my actual test so that says it all... Well worth paying the 5pound to unlock all content. Very realistic moc test that prepares you for the actual test!
reviews.author: adam chris

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Prepared for my test from this app and I passed my test really usefull

reviews.title: Adi
reviews.comment: This test is called adi driving test. This test is for approved driving instructor. It\'s not suitable for people who learns to drive car. So don\'t install if you are working to pass normal theory test for cars.
